title: MMR Kenta XC bike finally hits the trails following World Cup & Olympic refinement
content:
Back in May, MMR debuted its prototype Kenta XC 29er on the World Cup stage in Nov√© Mesto. The Kenta could again be spotted during the Olympic Games in Tokyo, and taking the top spot in the Italian XCO Championship. After more than three years in development, testing and racing, the Spanish bike company is
